name: Ruthless Means (Skill Card)
skill_activation: Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
skill_effect: Once per Duel, during your Main Phase, if you control an "Evil HERO" monster, you can discard 1 card to make 1 face-up monster your opponent controls lose ATK equal to its own DEF, or lose DEF equal to its own ATK (your choice).
